${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Punish2.NAME: Punish
${modID}:Punish2.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! ${modID}:Necrotic damage. NL Apply 1 ${modID}:Sin. NL Exhaust
${modID}:Punish2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! ${modID}:Necrotic damage. NL Apply 2 ${modID}:Sin. NL Exhaust

${modID}:HeroicPlay.NAME: Heroic Play
${modID}:HeroicPlay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Frail and !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Penitent.NAME: Penitent
${modID}:Penitent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! x !M! damage. NL Gain and apply 1 Strength.

${modID}:HydraFlail.NAME: Hydra Flail
${modID}:HydraFlail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy NL 2X times.

${modID}:SkillBookRed.NAME: Red Skill Book
${modID}:SkillBookRed.DESCRIPTION: Create a random red common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SkillBookRed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random upgraded red common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SkillBookGreen.NAME: Green Skill Book
${modID}:SkillBookGreen.DESCRIPTION: Create a random green common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SkillBookGreen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random upgraded green common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SkillBookBlue.NAME: Blue Skill Book
${modID}:SkillBookBlue.DESCRIPTION: Create a random blue common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SkillBookBlue.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random upgraded blue common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SkillBookPurple.NAME: Purple Skill Book
${modID}:SkillBookPurple.DESCRIPTION: Create a random purple common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SkillBookPurple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random upgraded purple common skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SkillBookColorless.NAME: Colorless Skill Book
${modID}:SkillBookColorless.DESCRIPTION: Create a random colorless uncommon skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SkillBookColorless.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a random upgraded purple uncommon skill in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PathofShadows.NAME: Path of Shadows
${modID}:PathofShadows.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B!x2 Block. NL Gain no more Block from cards this turn. NL Keep your Block at the start of next turn.

${modID}:Meditation.NAME: Meditation
${modID}:Meditation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain Frail and draw a card.

${modID}:WayoftheSnake.NAME: Way of the Snake
${modID}:WayoftheSnake.DESCRIPTION: Start each turn with a Punish in hand.
${modID}:WayoftheSnake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Start each turn with a Punish in hand.

${modID}:Deliverance.NAME: Deliverance
${modID}:Deliverance.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage, !M! ${modID}:Necrotic damage and apply !M! ${modID}:Sin. NL Increase both by !rubimod:Increase! on retain. NL Exhaust
${modID}:Deliverance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage, !M! ${modID}:Necrotic damage and apply !M! ${modID}:Sin. NL Increase both by !rubimod:Increase! on retain.

${modID}:InexorableDoom.NAME: Inexorable Doom
${modID}:InexorableDoom.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${modID}:Doom! ${modID}:Doom. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile if it has !M! cards.

${modID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${modID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the target is attacking, apply !M! ${modID}:Sin.

${modID}:FeastofAbsolution.NAME: Absolution
${modID}:FeastofAbsolution.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! and gain [E]. NL Cleanse all of the target's debuffs. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:FeastofAbsolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! and gain [E]. NL Cleanse all of the target's debuffs and heal the same amount. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HegemonsMercy.NAME: Hegemon's Mercy
${modID}:HegemonsMercy.DESCRIPTION: Cleanse all of the target's debuffs. NL Reduce their strength by the same amount. NL Only half is permanent.
${modID}:HegemonsMercy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cleanse all of the target's debuffs. NL Reduce their strength by the same amount. NL Only half is permanent. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
${modID}:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is attacking, create 2 Punish
${modID}:Riposte.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target is attacking, create 2 Punish+

${modID}:Punition.NAME: Punition
${modID}:Punition.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Sin. NL Deal ${modID}:Necrotic damage equal to the target's ${modID}:Sin.

${modID}:PhoenixForm.NAME: Phoenix Form
${modID}:PhoenixForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Increase your buffs by an amount that increases each turn.

${modID}:HegemonyCard.NAME: Hegemony
${modID}:HegemonyCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! ${modID}:Sin back.
${modID}:HegemonyCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! ${modID}:Sin back.

${modID}:DarkGuardian.NAME: Dark Guardian
${modID}:DarkGuardian.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you would lose Artifact, gain !M! Regen.
${modID}:DarkGuardian.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL Whenever you would lose Artifact, gain !M! Regen.

${modID}:SinEaterCard.NAME: Sin Eater
${modID}:SinEaterCard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would lose Artifact, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:LessonLearned.NAME: Lesson Learned
${modID}:LessonLearned.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a card in combat, reduce its cost by 1.

${modID}:RelentlessStudy.NAME: Relentless Study
${modID}:RelentlessStudy.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! random single-use uncommon skill in your hand each turn.

${modID}:LeechHose.NAME: Leech Hose
${modID}:LeechHose.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!X damage to ALL enemies and apply ${modID}:Bleed and Vulnerable for X turns.
${modID}:LeechHose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!X damage to ALL enemies and apply ${modID}:Bleed and Vulnerable for X turns. NL If this is the first card you play, reduce their strength by X.

${modID}:Sacrifice.NAME: Ritual Sacrifice
${modID}:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: You can no longer heal. NL !M! Strength.
${modID}:Sacrifice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You can no longer heal. NL !M! Strength and 1 Ritual.

${modID}:StoriedDagger.NAME: Storied Dagger
${modID}:StoriedDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Necrotoxin with each attack this turn.

${modID}:SuitUp.NAME: Suit Up!
${modID}:SuitUp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an unblocked attack deals damage, apply !M! ${modID}:Necrotoxin.

${modID}:Stall.NAME: Stall
${modID}:Stall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength, but also apply !${modID}:Stall! Regen on hit for the turn.
${modID}:Stall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Strength, but also apply !${modID}:Stall! Regen on hit for the turn.
